required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on February 08, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Antibodies Response to mRNA Vaccine Against Covid-19
clinical_study.official_title: SARS-Cov-2 Antibodies Response to BNT162b2 mRNA Vaccine to Prevent Covid-19

brief_summary.textblock: Vaccine rollout has started in many countries. In Italy, the Covid-19 vaccine used at the moment is the mRNA-based BNT162b2 and is given to Hospital employers. The investigators undertake this study to monitor IgM and IgG evolution after vaccination in the participant hospital settings, which includes 500 subjects.

detailed_description.textblock:
Vaccine rollout has started in many countries. In Italy, the Covid-19 vaccine used at the moment is the mRNA-based BNT162b2 and is given to Hospital employers.
The investigators undertake this observational study to monitor antibody evolution after vaccination in a hospital setting. The primary endpoint is serum IgM and IgG at the first month of 2nd jab, and at 3, 6, and 12 months afterward.
As secondary measures, nasopharyngeal swabs are included, at fortnight intervals to detects the spike protein antigen, in the event that putative vaccine inefficacy would expose the health personnel to Covid-19 disease with potential spreading to inpatients.
Further, clinical signs and symptoms are monitored at the weekly interval in the context of adverse reactions/events.

primary_outcome.measure: Serum IgM and IgG antibodies levels in response to vaccine
primary_outcome.description: Determination of IgM and IgG levels in serum

primary_outcome.measure: Serum IgM and IgG antibodies levels in response to vaccine
primary_outcome.description: Determination of IgM and IgG levels in serum

primary_outcome.measure: Serum IgM and IgG antibodies levels in response to vaccine
primary_outcome.description: Determination of IgM and IgG levels in serum

primary_outcome.measure: Serum IgM and IgG antibodies levels in response to vaccine
primary_outcome.description: Determination of IgM and IgG levels in serum

secondary_outcome.description: Monitoring of Sars-Cov2 infection by a nasopharyngeal swab of spike protein Ag, and PCR confirmation in case of Ag swab positivity.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Clinical monitoring of vaccinated subjects through the study completion, an average of 1 year.
secondary_outcome.description: Monitoring the occurrence of Covid-19 disease in vaccinated people

intervention.description: Hospital employers vaccinated with BNT162b2 mRNA against Sars-Cov2 are studied for serum antibody response.

study_pop.textblock: Health care and administrative workers of ICOT-Sapienza University Hospital

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Hospital employers vaccinated against Sars-Cov2
Exclusion Criteria:
- none
